activity.title: coronasafe/care#1103
activity.text:
Is this issue still relevant, can I take up this one??

And as far I understand 2nd part of it, It requires to create a seperate through table ConsultationBedAsset with the schema of something like this,
ConsultationBedAsset:
    consultation_bed  - ForeignKey
    asset  - ForeignKey
    
but i didn't get the purpose of BedFlag through table . can u explain?

activity.title: coronasafe/care#1310
activity.text:
@sainak 
UserAssingedSerializer is used at 2 places.
1. in FacilityUserViewSet, where I have made the changes to prefetch the skills.
2. in [PatientConsulationSerializer](https://github.com/coronasafe/care/blob/7d14e41251787fe1bbb952ac22278f998b86b24a/care/facility/api/serializers/patient_consultation.py#L68)  here i am not sure how it can be done.
Can u suggest , what can be done here?
